Reviews.Title: Amazing Value!
Reviews.Author: Iris Dunson "irisfromohio"
Reviews.Content: Just a stunningly, amazing & surprising value! It is decidedly more sturdy than the Curves my daughter has previously owned. Blackberries are known for their high quality & ease of use, but she can be a challenge to the sturdiest of electronics. This has all of that and more. At first, it was in my Best Buy cart, then something told me to come to Amazon. My angels were looking out for my bottom line, because all in all, I saved $30 on my purchase. My daughter likes to travel & this will be another positive feature for her.Now, I had to update the phone via Blackberry's Desktop Manager & it took four hours, but it was well worth it. This phone has reinforced my #1 daughter's conviction that she will only use a Blackberry (my friends tease her for being hooked on crackberry).The only drawback is that we are not able to stream any video, which caught me off guard, but, as my kids have pointed out, that is what iPads & the like are for!You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Excellent general economy cellphone
Reviews.Author: mr reality
Reviews.Content: Bought this Blackberry 8820 from Amazon, seller GigaGrab at a very good price--used--.I received the phone 2 days earlier than was listed (USPS).I immediately plugged in the  charger and to my surprise a little hour glass appeared and, a wipe and  scrub  initiated.Lord, what the hell is scrub.Panic now.I did online research and my mind was put to rest.This action is to wipe data from memory( security) . After 1 hr ,got a screen with all parameters,inserted old sim card and did the wizard.Now, I used the  wireless application for setting my wifi  to router ,but,I cannot make calls  and it says"radio turn off".Also top  screen corner SOS.Called AT&T; ,Cus Rep tried to unlock the Sim card, but unable to do it.I got a new Sim card from official ATT store and then called ATT  and they programmed it.Phone works great.Seller came through good  !!!!!!!happy!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: don't buy
Reviews.Author: VB
Reviews.Content: I had shipped this cell phone oversees for my parents. The first problem was1) It does not have a camera (which I did not see while purchasing)2) Sound is very small for elderly to hear3) It stopped working after 1 week of usageIt is not in the US otherwise I would have returned it immediatelyThis is my review after using the phone for a couple of months1) My parents fixed the earlier issue about dead phone -- there was a problem in charger2) Now another problem has arised -- the keys start falling off : one by one

Reviews.Title: No bad except for lack of camera
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: When I bought this, I just wanted a working blackberry phone at a low cost. This fit the bill. If it had a camera it would be perfect. Otherwise it works even though the  OS is a little outdated but that is also expected.But overall  good value for very cheap price.

Reviews.Title: no no no
Reviews.Author: jamell l holmes
Reviews.Content: The phone broke and my track ball only moves in one direction. Don't get this phone. Its not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Phone worked exactly as expected
Reviews.Author: Bill McCormack
Reviews.Content: The phone worked correctly,and it arrived on time.  My only difficulty was dealing was my unfamiliarity with the phone itself.  I used this phone for two weeks in Italy, and received a call 20 feet underground, while touring Etruscan necropolis.

Reviews.Title: Very old
Reviews.Author: quentbox "Quentin"
Reviews.Content: Visible scratches everywhere, especially on the screen.Functions are OK...........

Reviews.Title: okay fon
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: The fon arrived in a very good condition. my only problem with it is i cannot forward contacts via sms texting. there is no option for that. reason for taking a star off.

Reviews.Title: Works for me
Reviews.Author: April Goodier
Reviews.Content: The Blackerry 8820 is what I ordered.  Having problems hooking wi-fi to AT&T; at moment but will working that out.  Comes without camera.  Wish I had order higher model with camera.  Other than that what they say it is is what it is.  Great service

Reviews.Title: Alotiby
Reviews.Author: Hijab
Reviews.Content: Free goodThis product is very good and I advise its use in universities and places which do not allow cameras

Reviews.Title: Unexpected purchase
Reviews.Author: shatta2000
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my grandson but did not expect that old time phone so I have to purchase a new one because I will not give this to him especially with no camera. This phone will be put away, I just lost my money.

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: M. D.  Franklin
Reviews.Content: Could not get online with it using wifi.  Thus I was not able to use it to the fullest of my intent.

Reviews.Title: Phone is ok.
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Even though this phone came with way more scratches than anticipated,other than that,it serves my purpose especially for how much I paid for it.I'm over all happy...

Reviews.Title: Trashed
Reviews.Author: Alpheus
Reviews.Content: The ball stopped working within a month. It started by getting stuck, at times it gets back to work and the next it has stopped altogether until it decided to all together stop. I then had to put it in trash because I couldn't scrall to any where I wanted.

Reviews.Title: For gently used, it's great!
Reviews.Author: LLBean
Reviews.Content: It is a great phone to use. I do not like touch pad's, so going to this was good. However, when I was shopping for blackberry's I forgot that the older models do not have camera's.

Reviews.Title: It serves the purpose it was intended for - school
Reviews.Author: Satisfied Shopper "Jasmine C."
Reviews.Content: My son purchased this as it didn't include a camera due to regulations at school and was very happy with the purchase.You can still access the internet but the software on the phone cannot be upgraded too much as this is a very old phone

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: Stewart Gittens sg
Reviews.Content: It's not what I expected this phone look cheap feel cheap and the back cover would not stay on and no camera

Reviews.Title: not up to par
Reviews.Author: thelmal2003
Reviews.Content: product had been used quite a bit more then advertised. some of the letters were worn off of several keys

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: CA
Reviews.Content: this phone came very quick for traveling so far had a little tiny scratch no big deal this phone is great works perfect and it does get WIFI it looked basically brand new when i pulled it out the box

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: jbferrer70
Reviews.Content: Great product! More than what I expected. A a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a
